#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;


struct round
{
    string name;
    int score;
};

bool myfunc(round a,round b)
{
    return a.name<b.name;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,i;
        
        cin>>n;
        
        round arr[n+1];
        
        
        
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>arr[i].name>>arr[i].score;
        
        sort(arr,arr+n,myfunc);
        
        
        
        
        
        string win="";
        int max=-1;
        int k=0;
        
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            k+=arr[i].score;
            
            if(k>max)
            {
            max=k;
            win=arr[i].name;
            }
            
            if(arr[i].name.compare(arr[i+1].name)!=0)
            k=0;
        }
        
        cout<<win<<" "<<max<<"\n";
        
    }
}
